summary: Strategy Idea Detail Side Panel feature testing complete. All 9 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified: 480px slide-over panel opens on idea row click, shows title/badges/hooks/script/caption/hashtags, all 3 action buttons work correctly (Create Submission, Create AI Video Task, Copy Script).
passed_tests: GET /api/fvs/ideas/{id} returns full idea with hooks, caption, hashtags
POST /api/fvs/ideas/{id}/generate-script uses Hinglish style from Channel Profile
POST /api/video-tasks creates video task from idea script
FvsSystemPage idea row click opens side panel
Side panel shows title, status badge, format badge, conviction score
Side panel shows Hooks section with numbered list
Side panel shows Hinglish Script section (scrollable)
Side panel shows Caption & Hashtags section with hashtag badges
Copy Script button copies to clipboard and shows 'Copied!'
Create Submission from Idea button works and navigates to /dashboard/submissions
Create AI Video Task from Idea button works and navigates to /dashboard/video-lab
critical_code_review_comments: Side panel uses shadcn Sheet component with 480px width as specified
Script generation uses real LLM (Anthropic Claude) via Emergent key
Hooks, caption, and hashtags are generated on idea proposal and stored in DB
Script is generated on-demand when panel opens and saved back to idea document
seed_data_creation: Test submissions and video tasks created during testing
